table_description: Retrieve the rulesets of a specified GitHub repository.

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: Full name of the repository that contains the ruleset.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The date and time when the ruleset was created.

columns.name: database_id
columns.description: The database ID of the ruleset.

columns.name: enforcement
columns.description: The enforcement level of the ruleset.

columns.name: rules
columns.description: The list of rules in the ruleset.

columns.name: bypass_actors
columns.description: The list of actors who can bypass the ruleset.

columns.name: conditions
columns.description: The conditions under which the ruleset applies.
